          <title>
            <string language="es">Los alimentos transgénicos</string>
            <string language="en">Transgenic foods</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transgenic Nahrungsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nourritures transgéniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alimentos de Transgenic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alimenti di Transgenic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγενετικά τρόφιμα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir qué son los alimentos transgénicos y que beneficios o perjuicios pueden producir.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover what transgenic foods are and the benefits or damage that they may involve.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">transgénicos</string>
            <string language="en">transgenic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, was transgenic Nahrungsmittel sind und der Nutzen oder die 
Beschädigung, die sie mit einbeziehen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir ce que sont les nourritures transgéniques et les avantages 
ou les dommages qu'elles peuvent impliquer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir o 
que os alimentos transgenic são e os benefícios ou os danos que 
podem envolver.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire che cosa 
gli alimenti transgenic sono ed i benefici o danni che possono 
coinvolgere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
ποια διαγενετικά τρόφιμα είναι και τα οφέλη ή η ζημία που 
μπορούν να περιλάβουν.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
